title: Wool: from sheep to clothing
brief_description: A sheep ranch in Montana, USA, a spinning plant in Illinois; and a knitting mill in Wisconsin are studied in turn to show children how the sweaters and socks other woollen clothing they wear are grown and produced.
description: A sheep ranch in Montana, USA, a spinning plant in Illinois; and a knitting mill in Wisconsin are studied in turn to show children how the sweaters and socks other woollen clothing they wear are grown and produced.
